verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Ghost with light divine Shine upon this heart of mine Chase the shades of night away Turn my darkness into day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let me see my Savior's face Let me all His beauties trace Show those glorious truths to me Which are only known to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Ghost with power divine Cleanse this guilty heart of mine Long has sin without control Held dominion o'er my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Ghost with joy divine Cheer this saddened heart of mine Bid my many woes depart Heal my wounded bleeding heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Spirit all divine Dwell within this heart of mine Cast down every idol throne Reign supreme and reign alone{/lang-eng}
